description: The project involves the acquisition of engineering services for support in perception and control for remotely operated and autonomous systems (ROAS) located in Valcartier, Qu\u00e9bec, Canada.The project is financed by the Department of Public Works and Government Services through the Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) program. Request for Bids (RFB) shall be open to its direct participation and that of prime contractor,FirmD partners
